00018 LibraryTreeWidget::LibraryTreeWidget(VLNVDialer* dialer, 
00019                                                                          LibraryInterface* handler,
00020                                                                          LibraryTreeModel* dataModel,
00021                                                                          QWidget* parent):
00022 QWidget(parent),
00023 view_(handler, &filter_, this),
00024 filter_(handler, dialer, dataModel, this), 
00025 dataModel_(dataModel) {
00026 
00027         // set view to use LibraryTreeFilter as source model
00028         view_.setModel(&filter_);
00029 
00030         // the layout to manage the visible items in the widget
00031         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00032         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00033 
00034         setupConnections(dataModel);
00035 
00036         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00037 }

00043 void LibraryTreeWidget::setupConnections(LibraryTreeModel* dataModel) {
00044 
00045         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00046                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00047 
00048         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00049                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00050 
00051         // connect the view to the tree model
00052         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(openComponent(const QModelIndex&)),
00053                 dataModel, SLOT(onOpenComponent(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00054 
00055         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(openDesign(const QModelIndex&)), 
00056                 dataModel, SLOT(onOpenDesign(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00057 
00058         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createNewComponent(const QModelIndex&)),
00059                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateNewComponent(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060 
00061         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createNewDesign(const QModelIndex&)),
00062                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateNewDesign(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00063 
00064         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(openBus(const QModelIndex&)),
00065                 dataModel, SLOT(onOpenBus(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00066 
00067         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createBus(const QModelIndex&)),
00068                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateBus(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069 
00070         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(createAbsDef(const QModelIndex&)),
00071                 dataModel, SLOT(onCreateAbsDef(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00072 
00073         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(deleteItem(const QModelIndex&)),
00074                 dataModel, SLOT(onDeleteItem(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00075

00081

00083                 this, SIGNAL(itemSelected(const VLNV&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00084

00086                 &filter_, SLOT(invalidate()), Qt::UniqueConnection);

00089 void LibraryTreeWidget::prepareDrag( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00090 
00091         if (!index.isValid())
00092                 return;
00093 
00094         LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00095         VLNV* vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00096 
00097         // if pointer is valid
00098         if (vlnv) {
00099                 QDrag *drag = new QDrag(this);
00100                 QMimeData *mimeData = new QMimeData;
00101 
00102                 mimeData->setData("data/vlnvptr", QByteArray((const char*)&vlnv, sizeof(vlnv)));
00103                 drag->setMimeData(mimeData);
00104                 drag->exec();
00105         }
00106 
00107         return;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void LibraryTreeWidget::selectItem( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00111         
00112         // if vlnv is not valid
00113         if (!vlnv.isValid()) {
00114 
00115                 // do not select anything
00116                 view_.clearSelection();
00117         }
00118 
00119         
00120         // find the item to be selected
00121         LibraryItem* item = dataModel_->getRoot()->findItem(vlnv);
00122 
00123         // if item is not found then print an error message telling user that 
00124         // library is corrupted
00125         if (!item) {
00126                 emit errorMessage(tr("Selected item was not found, library is corrupted."));
00127                 return;
00128         }
00129 
00130         // create an index to the item
00131         QModelIndex itemIndex = dataModel_->index(item);
00132 
00133         QModelIndex filteredIndex = filter_.mapFromSource(itemIndex);
00134         
00135         // tell view to select the item
00136         view_.setCurrentIndex(filteredIndex);
00137 }
